body: Welcome Teachers! Scotts Bluff National Monument has much to offer students of all ages studying various subjects. From cultural history to natural history, it can be found here.  Field trips are welcome year around with a reservation. Academic Fee Waivers are available to qualified groups. Please read the Application Guidelines. before filling out the Academic Fee Waiver Request Form. Also fill out a Group Reservation Form so we know what activities your group is planning during their visit.
title: Scotts Bluff National Monument: Education
